Procedure.name: Asylum Application
Procedure.description: The formal process by which a person applies for refugee status in a host country.

Procedure.name: Border Asylum Request
Procedure.description: Requesting asylum upon arrival at the border of a host country.

Procedure.name: Temporary Residence Permit Application
Procedure.description: Applying for a permit to stay temporarily in the host country while an asylum claim is processed.

Procedure.name: Refugee Status Determination
Procedure.description: The legal process to determine whether an asylum seeker qualifies as a refugee.

Procedure.name: Family Reunification Process
Procedure.description: The procedure to reunite refugees with their immediate family members in the host country.

Procedure.name: Subsidiary Protection Application
Procedure.description: Applying for protection for those who do not qualify as refugees but are at risk if returned to their home country.

Procedure.name: Appeal Against Asylum Rejection
Procedure.description: The process of challenging a decision that denies asylum status.

Procedure.name: Asylum Interview
Procedure.description: An interview conducted to assess the validity of an asylum seeker's claim.

Procedure.name: Detention Review Hearing
Procedure.description: A legal procedure to determine whether an asylum seeker should be released from detention.

Procedure.name: Work Permit Application
Procedure.description: The process of applying for authorization to work in the host country.

Procedure.name: Deportation Order Challenge
Procedure.description: The legal procedure to contest a deportation order issued against a refugee or asylum seeker.

Procedure.name: Temporary Protection Application
Procedure.description: Applying for temporary protection status for those fleeing large-scale conflicts.

Procedure.name: Medical Examination for Asylum
Procedure.description: A health screening required as part of the asylum application process.

Procedure.name: Application for Humanitarian Protection
Procedure.description: Requesting protection based on humanitarian grounds, often for those who do not meet the criteria for refugee status.

Procedure.name: Registration of Asylum Seeker
Procedure.description: The initial process of registering an asylum seeker upon arrival in the host country.

Procedure.name: Country of Origin Information Request
Procedure.description: Requesting detailed information about the asylum seeker's home country to assist in the refugee status determination process.

Procedure.name: Visa Extension Application
Procedure.description: The process of applying for an extension of a temporary visa while awaiting an asylum decision.

Procedure.name: Naturalization Application
Procedure.description: The procedure for refugees to apply for citizenship in the host country.

Procedure.name: Unaccompanied Minor Protection Request
Procedure.description: A process to ensure the safety and care of unaccompanied minors seeking asylum.

Procedure.name: Housing Assistance Application
Procedure.description: Requesting support for finding and securing housing during the asylum process.

Procedure.name: Emergency Shelter Request
Procedure.description: Applying for immediate shelter upon arrival in the host country.

Procedure.name: Language Course Enrollment
Procedure.description: The process of enrolling in language courses to facilitate integration into the host country.

Procedure.name: Healthcare Registration
Procedure.description: Registering for access to healthcare services in the host country.

Procedure.name: Education Access Request
Procedure.description: Applying for access to education for children and adults within the refugee or asylum-seeking community.

Procedure.name: Psychosocial Support Request
Procedure.description: Requesting access to mental health and social support services.

Procedure.name: Legal Aid Application
Procedure.description: The process of applying for legal representation or assistance during the asylum process.

Procedure.name: Vulnerability Assessment
Procedure.description: A procedure to identify and address the specific needs of vulnerable asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Biometric Data Collection
Procedure.description: The process of collecting biometric data, such as fingerprints, as part of the asylum application.

Procedure.name: Detention Appeal
Procedure.description: Appealing a decision to detain an asylum seeker or refugee.

Procedure.name: Family Relocation Assistance
Procedure.description: Support for relocating family members to join a refugee or asylum seeker in the host country.

Procedure.name: Travel Document Application
Procedure.description: Applying for travel documents necessary for international travel for refugees.

Procedure.name: Age Assessment for Unaccompanied Minors
Procedure.description: A procedure to verify the age of unaccompanied minors seeking asylum.

Procedure.name: Special Needs Assessment
Procedure.description: Evaluating the specific needs of refugees with disabilities or other special conditions.

Procedure.name: Medical Treatment Request
Procedure.description: Applying for access to necessary medical treatments for asylum seekers and refugees.

Procedure.name: Integration Assistance Request
Procedure.description: Requesting support for integration into the host country's society, including job placement and social services.

Procedure.name: Asylum Hearing
Procedure.description: A formal court hearing to review an asylum seeker's case.

Procedure.name: Child Protection Referral
Procedure.description: Referring unaccompanied minors or children at risk to child protection services.

Procedure.name: Refugee Resettlement Application
Procedure.description: Applying for resettlement in a third country for refugees who cannot return to their home country.

Procedure.name: Status Update Request
Procedure.description: Requesting updates on the status of an asylum or refugee application.

Procedure.name: Humanitarian Visa Application
Procedure.description: Applying for a visa on humanitarian grounds, often for those in urgent need of protection.

Procedure.name: Voluntary Repatriation Application
Procedure.description: Applying to voluntarily return to one's country of origin.

Procedure.name: Identity Verification
Procedure.description: The process of verifying the identity of asylum seekers and refugees.

Procedure.name: Legal Status Verification
Procedure.description: Confirming the legal status of refugees or asylum seekers within the host country.

Procedure.name: Work Permit Renewal
Procedure.description: The process of renewing a work permit for refugees or asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Residence Permit Renewal
Procedure.description: Renewing a temporary or permanent residence permit.

Procedure.name: Human Trafficking Victim Identification
Procedure.description: The procedure to identify and protect victims of human trafficking among refugees and asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Detention Conditions Complaint
Procedure.description: Filing a complaint about the conditions experienced in detention centers.

Procedure.name: Refugee Camp Registration
Procedure.description: Registering in a refugee camp upon arrival.

Procedure.name: Security Screening
Procedure.description: A procedure to assess security risks associated with refugees or asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Employment Assistance Request
Procedure.description: Requesting help in finding employment in the host country.

Procedure.name: Temporary Housing Allocation
Procedure.description: Assigning temporary housing to refugees or asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Citizenship Interview
Procedure.description: An interview conducted as part of the naturalization process.

Procedure.name: Immigration Status Update
Procedure.description: Updating the immigration authorities about changes in personal circumstances.

Procedure.name: Mandatory Cultural Orientation
Procedure.description: Participating in a cultural orientation program required for integration.

Procedure.name: Refugee Card Application
Procedure.description: Applying for an official refugee identification card.

Procedure.name: DNA Testing for Family Reunification
Procedure.description: Undergoing DNA testing to confirm familial relationships for reunification.

Procedure.name: Emergency Financial Aid Application
Procedure.description: Applying for financial assistance in urgent situations.

Procedure.name: Appeal for Refugee Status Reinstatement
Procedure.description: Challenging a decision to revoke refugee status.

Procedure.name: Immigration Court Hearing
Procedure.description: A court hearing to address issues related to immigration status.

Procedure.name: Gender-Based Asylum Claim
Procedure.description: Filing an asylum claim based on persecution due to gender.

Procedure.name: Human Rights Claim
Procedure.description: Requesting asylum based on the violation of fundamental human rights.

Procedure.name: Appeal for Asylum Extension
Procedure.description: Requesting an extension of asylum protection due to ongoing risks.

Procedure.name: Housing Conditions Complaint
Procedure.description: Filing a complaint regarding inadequate housing conditions.

Procedure.name: Disability Assessment for Refugees
Procedure.description: Evaluating the needs and accommodations required for disabled refugees.

Procedure.name: Legal Advocacy for Detained Asylum Seekers
Procedure.description: Providing legal representation to asylum seekers in detention.

Procedure.name: Immigration Status Verification
Procedure.description: The procedure to verify an individual's immigration status.

Procedure.name: Unaccompanied Minor Guardianship Application
Procedure.description: Requesting guardianship for unaccompanied minors.

Procedure.name: Migrant Workers Rights Claim
Procedure.description: Filing a claim for the protection of labor rights for migrant workers.

Procedure.name: Temporary Housing Extension Request
Procedure.description: Requesting an extension of temporary housing accommodations.

Procedure.name: Deportation Deferral Request
Procedure.description: Requesting to delay or defer a deportation order.

Procedure.name: Emergency Medical Aid Application
Procedure.description: Applying for urgent medical assistance for asylum seekers and refugees.

Procedure.name: Volunteer Support Enrollment
Procedure.description: Registering for volunteer support services to assist refugees.

Procedure.name: Shelter Allocation for Unaccompanied Minors
Procedure.description: Providing shelter specifically for unaccompanied minors.

Procedure.name: Legal Referral for Asylum Seekers
Procedure.description: Referring asylum seekers to legal services for representation.

Procedure.name: Biometric Identity Verification
Procedure.description: Confirming identity through biometric data as part of the asylum process.

Procedure.name: Legal Advice for Asylum Seekers
Procedure.description: Providing legal guidance to individuals seeking asylum.

Procedure.name: Sponsorship Application for Refugees
Procedure.description: Applying for private or community sponsorship for refugees.

Procedure.name: Country of Origin Risk Assessment
Procedure.description: Evaluating the risks faced by asylum seekers if returned to their home country.

Procedure.name: Refugee Family Relocation Application
Procedure.description: Applying for relocation to another country to reunite with family members.

Procedure.name: Citizenship Oath Ceremony
Procedure.description: The final step in the naturalization process, where refugees take an oath of allegiance.

Procedure.name: Appeal Against Detention
Procedure.description: Challenging the decision to detain a refugee or asylum seeker.

Procedure.name: Social Services Enrollment
Procedure.description: Registering for social services to support integration and well-being.

Procedure.name: Immigration Detention Review
Procedure.description: A review of the legal grounds and conditions of immigration detention.

Procedure.name: Crisis Intervention Request
Procedure.description: Seeking immediate assistance in a crisis situation involving refugees.

Procedure.name: Visa Renewal Application
Procedure.description: The process of renewing a visa for refugees or asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Early Childhood Education Access
Procedure.description: Applying for access to early childhood education for refugee children.

Procedure.name: Human Rights Advocacy Request
Procedure.description: Requesting advocacy services for the protection of human rights for refugees and asylum seekers.

Procedure.name: Refugee Status Termination Appeal
Procedure.description: Appealing a decision to terminate refugee status.
